text: Silly Fellows is a 2018 Telugu comedy film starring Allari Naresh, Sunil, Chitra Shukla, Nandini Rai, and Jaya Prakash Reddy in lead roles. It is directed by Bhimaneni Srinivasa Rao. Produced by Kiran Reddy, Bharath Chowdary, TG Vishwa Prasad and Vivek Kuchibhotla under the banner Blue Planet Entertainments LLP and People Media Factory. The film was a remake of Tamil film Velainu Vandhutta Vellaikaaran (2016). ==Plot== Veerababu's tricks his friend Soori into marrying Pushpa while Veerababu falls in love with Vasanthi. As problems start to rise, Veerababu and Soori goes to MLA Jacket Janaki Ram, who in spite of all of the problems falls into a coma. How Janaki Ram recovers from the coma to file Soori's divorce and fix Veerababu's land issues forms the rest of the story. == Cast == *Allari Naresh as Veerababu *Sunil as Soori *Chitra Shukla as Vasanthi *Nandini Rai as Pushpa *Jaya Prakash Reddy as Jacket Janaki Ram *Brahmanandam as Fake DGP *Posani Krishna Murali as Prasad *Poorna *Raja Ravindra *Chalapathi Rao *Raghu Karumanchi *Jhansi as Vasanthi's Mom *Hema *Sivannarayana Naripeddi as Doctor == Soundtrack == Music in the film includes: *Silly Fellows — by Geetha Vasanth, Master Sri Charan, and Pranav Chaganty (2:28) *Headache Ra Mama Headache — by Penchal Das (3:59) *Pilla Nee Buggalu — by Rahul Sipligunj (3:12) == References == == External links == * Category:2018 films Category:Indian screwball comedy films Category:Indian films Category:2010s screwball comedy films Category:2010s Telugu-language films Category:Telugu remakes of Tamil films Category:Films directed by Bhimaneni Srinivasa Rao Category:2018 comedy films
title: Silly Fellows
